That Uru thing..

Last Friday, Cyan released Untï¿½l Uru. It felt pretty good to get somthing out that is almost all my work. I couldn’t of done it without Grey Dragon’s help, but I did all the technical work.

The reaction in the community has been pretty cool to watch. I know how many people felt after Live was killed. I am just happy I have been able to give some of Live back to them.
